title: Beef pumpkin and split pea soup
ingredients: ['450g yellow split peas', '1 onion, diced', '4 onions, thinly sliced', '60g margarine', '1.5 litres chicken stock', '450g peeled, seeded and diced sugar pumpkin', '450g salt beef brisket, fat removed and diced', '1 green chilli, chopped', '3 dashes aromatic bitters, such as Campari']
